scripts.deploy:superchain-badges:base-sepolia: npx hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/SuperchainBadges.ts --parameters ignition/parameters/base-sepolia.json --network base-sepolia
scripts.deploy:superchain-badges:unichain-sepoli: npx hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/SuperchainBadges.ts --parameters ignition/parameters/unichain-sepolia.json --network unichain-sepolia
